website_summaries.verdict: This protein bar is as sweet as a candy bar with little sugar and some crunch, while carrying 30 grams of protein.
pros: 6-layer bar means incredible taste and plenty protein per serving
cons: 6 grams of sugar per serving is the highest on our list

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Peanut butter is my favorite fit crunch flavor. Half a bar is a guilt free dessert that fits my macros nicely. I also like these for traveling in a pinch, but these are less expensive at Walmart now so I won't be buying them on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Price increase
customer_reviews.text: Love the peanut butter flavor bars. I had been subscribed to these for about a year, great tasting fair price. But recently they jacked up the price to $32.99 and have cancelled by subscription orders at $23..that's too bad. I am unwilling to pay the extra $10 for these.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and quality.
customer_reviews.text: The new Flavor PB Jelly taste exactly like PB.jelly sandwich!! FitCrunch,you guys nail it!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: These bars are terrible. Do not waste your money on them. I absolutely love the peanut butter one and this does not compare at all. The nutritional value is way different than the other bar. I wish I could send them back. I would pay for the one bar that I ate but this has been a huge waste of money. I will not eat them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Remarkable variety of textures — it’s sweet but no flavor
customer_reviews.text: I like these bars, but I don’t love them as much as I do any of the other Fit Crunch bars. The problem is, while Fit Crunch’s remarkable texture variety is absolutely perfect in this bar (as it is in all the company’s bars), this one just doesn’t taste like anything to me except sugar. In a way, that’s enjoyable, but I really wanted it to taste like Oreos. If I use my imagination, they almost do, but I’m kidding myself. If you want the best tasting Fit Crunch bar, go with the Mint Chocolate Chip flavor. It’s simply delicious. This one is not.
customer_reviews.author: Charles T. WhiteTop Contributor: Watches

customer_reviews.title: Beware of who you’re buying from - bars great, W.E.Distribution terrible
customer_reviews.text: The bars themselves are great - I’ve been eating them for ages - but W.E. Distribution are terrible. They simply stuck an address label on the fit crunch box with no packaging. There were only 5 bars in the box and all were melted and misshapen. I’ve bought these before from Amazon and didn’t realize that this time they were sold by W.E.Distribution instead of Amazon themselves. Read the small print, make sure they’re sold and shipped by Amazon and not W.E.Distribution!
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: slightly expensive, but good
customer_reviews.text: I don't like many protein bars, but I eat them for lunch since it's easier on a type 1 Diabetic. these taste WAY better then just about any other Protein bar i have tried. these are a bit on the expensive side, but they are great. and that is my only complaint. Or maybe they can sell a bigger value pack to save a little more on these.
customer_reviews.author: Justin C.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: We go through a lot of protein bars and we all agree these taste pretty dang good! Even the kids like them and they are picky. Hubby and I really like the taste of them and that they are different than the normal chocolate kind. The peanut butter and grape jelly combo is our new favorite!
customer_reviews.author: A Turner

customer_reviews.title: Unexpectedly good & filling
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a lot of power bars because I'm active and have a high metabolism. This one has staying power. I don't get urges to snack shortly after eating it. My partner who's smaller than me gets full after eating half a bar. The combinations of flavors combine with its texture and thickness in a satiating way. Thanks to Robert for making something scrumptious for those of us who don't own restaurants!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Something different from the rest and a great change of pace!
customer_reviews.text: All of these protein bars are always some variant of chocolate/vanilla/peanut butter between the three. This bar though having a jelly layer makes it entirely unique. I just received my box as I was getting ready for lunch and this became the main course. It was as good if not better than I expected! Cannot wait to see this back in stock!
customer_reviews.author: Nunya Biz

customer_reviews.title: One of the best protein bars on the market
customer_reviews.text: Great tasting (peanut butter and choc chip cookie dough) yet low calorie, low sugar, and high protein. Not a fan of the cookies and cream or b-day cake flavors (haven't tried pb&j or caramel peanut) but that's just my taste buds. Some bars do have lower calories and sugar but taste like wafer-boards others taste like real cake or cheesecake but are through the roof in calories and sugar. I think the fitcrunch bars are the great compromise.
customer_reviews.author: Paceline

customer_reviews.title: Not Gluten Free
customer_reviews.text: These bars are advertised as Gluten Free but they are NOT gluten free. Just because your recipe doesn't include gluten, doesn't mean you can claim it is a gluten free product. Scan the bar with the Gluten Free Scanner app and it comes up "Contains Gluten". My son with celiac disease, saw the bar said Gluten Free and ate 1/2 one now he's doubled over the toilet having been glutened.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: I prefer the snack size
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the snack size of these and went through them right away so i thought getting the full size would be a good move. Honestly they are way too big - I love the amount of protein & sugar but I've only finished maybe three of them and have the rest of them stored in the box. The snack size was ideal in my opinion because they were the size of a regular bar.
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: Good energy source
customer_reviews.text: These bars taste good and I find them to be a good source of pre-workout energy. They're great before a long run, or before a resistance workout. I was buying the full size bars at a supermarket in NC, and they were discounted. We moved to our current location in WV, and I can't find them in stores. They're pricier on Amazon, but I like them enough to order.
customer_reviews.author: murphydog

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting protein bar I've ever had!
customer_reviews.text: Update after ordering several boxes from Amazon I've noticed the these bars seem like they've been sitting around awhile and do not look or taste fresh. I now only by them in singles from Walmart. My local Walmart store doesn't have the large bars in a box only singles. The bars look and taste miles better. The cost is $1.99 per bar at Walmart. I took my review down one star because of this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good taste
customer_reviews.text: Most of these bars taste great. The peanut butter one especially. They are addictive. Easily the best protein bars I have had. I won’t be buying the variety pack again because I do not care for the birthday cake flavor. Also the price here is quite a bit higher than what you can find in the discount stores.
customer_reviews.author: Gray L.

customer_reviews.title: Best protein bar on the market; buy in bulk when it's on sale
customer_reviews.text: By far my favorite protein bars. Peanut Butter flavor is the clear favorite, can eat it daily for weeks without tiring of the taste. Pro tip: buy in bulk with it's available because the Peanut Butter flavor in particular seems to go weeks without being in stock.
customer_reviews.author: --jl--

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting protein bar
customer_reviews.text: I have had my fair share of protein bars and either they are chalky or grainy. I accidentally stumbled upon these couple of years ago and bought them at Walmart and local convenience stores. Though the price difference is not much on Amazon, compared to others, the product is still very good. Taste is excellent, and it is essentially a treat, if you think about it.
customer_reviews.author: Praveen R

customer_reviews.title: delivery method needs to change
customer_reviews.text: Delivered in 108° weather by usps melted in recycled bag and product box damaged. Wow and I was looking forward to taste of new bar. I will keep the bars, but highly recommend keeping the product chilled during delivery or customers will be seeking returns/refunds. My last purchase for these bars...
customer_reviews.author: Fitness After 50: believe & achieve

customer_reviews.title: Horrible-Crumbly-Melted, rotten
customer_reviews.text: Be aware, we have bought this product in a store and it looks like a regular bar coated in chocolate, very tasty. The pictures I posted is how the bars showed up from Amazon. Im guessing they were stored in way too hot conditions or a very bad batch. I won't let anyone eat them, not worth getting sick from, they look rotten.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Marriott

customer_reviews.title: Mixed results
customer_reviews.text: Husband likes them. I don’t care for them. They leave an aftertaste to me - probably the artificial sweetener. Lots of additives too. Super long list of ingredients. Expensive but this size is really large. Should probably be 2 servings but husband eats it all. Cheaper through Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: CeCe

customer_reviews.title: These are by far the best protein bars on the market in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the best protein bars on the market in my opinion. If you are into tracking your macros then you know how hard it can be sometimes to meet your daily goals. Sometimes you get tired of the shakes but this is like a candy bar that's good for you and with only 6 grams of sugar. I love the peanut butter and may try some of the other flavors. Package came in a padded envelope and didn't suffer any damage. Will be buying these again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied Couple

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs down--Soy protein is the second ingredient
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased these a few times and they taste fine but they are marketed and promoted as a whey protein bar. There is a picture of the ingredients which I didn't read so they aren't hiding it but I'm staying away from soy protein isolate so I won't purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: nancy a.

customer_reviews.title: Great Bar...if you get the right flavor
customer_reviews.text: The caramel peanut bars are the best of this bunch. I decided to try the "Birthday Cake" flavor. Stay far away. Very artificial, bland and near-flavorless. Costco sells the 18-pack of the caramel peanut bars for around $17 regular price, and they do offer them on sale from time to time.
customer_reviews.author: Chipmunk Consulting

customer_reviews.title: Tasty 390 Tasty Calories, Not chalky like most....
customer_reviews.text: Delicious bar, great for a lunch replacement at work or a get-me-thru-til-6pm afternoon snack. I will definitely pack a box of these in my hunting bag along with almonds, sunflower seeds and oatmeal. Not chalky, most flavors are tasty. Slightly expensive but you get what you pay for. Solid product
customer_reviews.author: Ohio Floriculture Guy

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Like an Actual PbJ Sandwhich.
customer_reviews.text: Officially love these protein bars. good calories and high in protein while being low in carbs and sugars. The flavors are also great! The Chocolate Chip tastes amazing and the PBJ one oddly tastes like an actual PBJ sandwich. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nato S.

customer_reviews.title: Melted
customer_reviews.text: Every bar was melted. Put them in the fridge for a hour, ate one, awful after taste. Maybe it was due to the bars being melted. Fitcrunch is one of my favorite protein bars, and when they are on sale at store, I stock up. These peanut butter and jelly bars, awful; wasted my money
customer_reviews.author: PPA

customer_reviews.title: Pay attention to the ingredients.
customer_reviews.text: I found out the hard way that these contain sugar alcohols and that my body is not fond of them. They tasted great and worked well as a meal alternative until the bloating and pain started. As long as you don’t have issues with sugar alcohol then this is the bar for you!
customer_reviews.author: Cackiee

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE BARS
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THESE BARS! So satisfying. I feel like I’m getting a treat each time I eat one. Great for recovery after my workouts and a quick breakfast if I’m rushing. I would love for them to add more fiber to the bars, but they’re still my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great taste!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought a a dozen boxes of these, over time. My teenage boys love them after a workout or on a lazy day. There are so many protein bars to choose from these days and we’ve tried many, these are our family favorite!
customer_reviews.author: NJ

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and excellent nutritional values
customer_reviews.text: Great taste and excellent nutritional values. Only downside is they can be a mess to eat because the chocolate coating can crumble a bit. However the taste and texture of the bar make this very easy to overlook. Just don't try to eat it while driving a car. :)
customer_reviews.author: Vincent J. Anido

customer_reviews.title: Delicious! My favorite by far!
customer_reviews.text: There’s only two protein bars that I like and actually enjoy eating. This is definitely one of them! I tried these at the Vegas expo for nearly half the price but love them that much that I’ll pay full price for them!
customer_reviews.author: Heather W

customer_reviews.title: Great taste but HUGE bar
customer_reviews.text: I would give these 5 stars if they were a more reasonable size. They are super delicious and the texture is a nice change from many bars on the market. Unfortunately, they only come in the full size bar which is HUGE at 380kCal. I break them into quarters or thirds but always want just a bit more. 😊
customer_reviews.author: LAW

customer_reviews.title: A Good Protein Alternative
customer_reviews.text: I was sold after the first bite because it didn't have the chalky protein taste. The chocolate part is exceptionally good. I liked it so much; I ate the whole box in two weeks as a meal supplement.
customer_reviews.author: spynovel_junkie

customer_reviews.title: The best protein bar you’ll ever have
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best protein bars we’ve ever had! My husband can’t stop raving about them. It’s a not-so-guilty pleasure. There are actual layers that really add to the eating experience, and it is such a nice change from the usual chocolate- covered grainy mush we’re used to ;) It’s so good we look forward to replacing a meal with them! Least favorite is the cinnamon... hard to pick after that!
customer_reviews.author: DuncanH

customer_reviews.title: Best protein bar on the market
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best protein bar I have ever had. No comparison, they're delicious and a good amount of fat/carbs/protein. Cookie dough and peanut butter are my favorite flavors. If you love the convenience of protein bars and want something to help crave your sweet tooth, LOOK NO FURTHER!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High protein meal replacement
customer_reviews.text: We always keep a few of these handy for those times when we're on the go and may not be able to get a healthy lunch. They're great for travel. I usually order the variety pack - which seems to be the same four flavors. It would be nice if they would switch them up once in a while.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Sacks

customer_reviews.title: Arrived melted and didn't include the variety flavors listed in the description.
customer_reviews.text: The description said the variety box included: Peanut butter, caramel peanut, cookie dough and peanut butter and jelly. However, there were no peanut butter and jelly flavored bars, but cookies and cream in place of it. I do not like the cookies and cream flavor and would not have purchased this if description had been accurate. Also, the bars were all melted upon arrival, so I had to refrigerate immediately, which did help them stay together but the chocolate is discolored now since it was melted then hardened again.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Very good bars.
customer_reviews.text: These arrived quickly. Love these bars, use them for meal replacements on the road. Cheaper than buying one at a time at grocery, but still pretty expensive. Great product though.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Fitcrunch hands down is my favorite protein bar
customer_reviews.text: Fitcrunch hands down is my favorite protein bar...... I live on these things ...... more protein, less sugars than every other bar...and the peanut caramel is exactly like eating candy...not cardboard...
customer_reviews.author: Raymond A Landolfi

customer_reviews.title: Could never keep them in stock then disconntinued them...?
customer_reviews.text: One of my 2 fav flavors and Wally World put them on clearance...??? They have plenty of protein and make a great meal replcement bar. Gluten free is also good for my acid reflux. Found them at my super market cheaper than Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: i_taz

customer_reviews.title: Knocks your PB&J Sandwich outta the park!
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST FLAVOR FITCRUNCH has made! It’s not like your typical PB&J Sandwich it’s so much more! Bursting with layers of jelly and peanut butter then to top it off crushed nuts for that little bit of crunch! This box won’t last me long before ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: JodieJfit

customer_reviews.title: Great protein bars, only wish they were not as expensive!
customer_reviews.text: I love these protein bars! These and MetRx are my favorite brands of protein bar. Love the flavor, the amount of protein (30g) and how much they fill me up compared to other brands. My only issue is that they're too expensive, otherwise I would enable an auto-order for these haha.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Packaging
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving this a five star for everything but the presentation. They need to put these in another box with ice coolers around them. It’s brutal in places like Texas especially in the summer. Other than ty, they are fabulous bars.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri D. Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: MY FAVORITE FLAVOR
customer_reviews.text: I got the peanut butter and jelly bars, and let me tell you, theyre AMAZING. it tastes like you're biting into the childhood sandwich. With a glass of milk, it's the PERFECT snack. 100% recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria born

customer_reviews.title: These taste terrible
customer_reviews.text: I have tried all of the FITCRUNCH bars, these are by far the worst tasting. Most of them are a little too sweet-tasting for me even though they contain very little sugar.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Protein Anywhere Anytime
customer_reviews.text: Awesome way to get your protein on the run and as a quick snack. Great taste! New flavors also available. Great choice for a protein bar! Quality and taste number 1.
customer_reviews.author: Cecelia M

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and Nutritious
customer_reviews.text: I know taste is subjective...but I love the taste of these bars. I've had alot of protein bars in my life and these are by far my favorite. Especially at 380 calories a pop these are not only good tasting but also help in getting those extra calories packed into your daily intake. If you're into lifting and struggle eating enough calories a day to gain weight these are a fantastic choice. I would absolutely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob S

customer_reviews.title: Great taste, texture, and good source of calories!
customer_reviews.text: Had a bar almost everyday and never became tired of it! I used to be a big fan of quest bars, however the texture quickly became bland (even with different flavors). I love the taste and texture of this MUCH more. I also bought these because they have more calories to help me reach my daily goal (which I found harder with quest bars which are only about 160calories). Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Saki

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as other flavors
customer_reviews.text: Like the product but the peanut butter flavor had too much of an artificial sugar taste. The other flavor we have tried is the Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough and this is much better and very good without that taste.
customer_reviews.author: Sonfish

customer_reviews.title: No issues here
customer_reviews.text: My husband who’s is 55 really likes these bars and has no issues with the sugar alcohols. Very satisfying and good to take on trips around town or to work.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: So good, but HUGE!
customer_reviews.text: Hubby loves them! We got one of the flavors at Costco (snack size) and ordered these to try new flavors. His fave is now peanut butter and jelly! The regular bars are MASSIVE and definitely a meal replacement. Wish they had a snack variety pack with even more flavors to try!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Good tasty protein bars
customer_reviews.text: These protein bars are good tasting and just hot the right spot when you need that quick snack! The price is way too high from Amazon I picked up the same size box at Costco for half the price I paid from amazon won’t order them again !!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The mouth feel is good. If you’ve had nasty protein bars in the ...
customer_reviews.text: These are delicious and not too chewy or too dry. The balance of fats, carbs and proteins is ideal. The mouth feel is good. If you’ve had nasty protein bars in the past this will be a welcome change.
customer_reviews.author: christin wasson

customer_reviews.title: Fulfilling treat or meal substitute
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but worth it. Replaces other bars unless you are not in the mood for chocolate. I use half a bar as dessert and then eat the other half later as a snack.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Food!
customer_reviews.text: Love these bars makes the perfect breakfast when time is short. They have everything! I like the larger bars with 30 grams of protein. the blend of peanut butter and the crunchies offer so much enjoyment!
customer_reviews.author: John J. Shea

customer_reviews.title: Your PB&J sandwich but better!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fitcrunch and Robert Irvine does it again. This bar is excellent. Great balance of macros and flavor is tremendous. Exterior is silky and smooth. Definitely reminiscent of a traditional pb&j sandwich but much healthier option. Not overly sweet, bit a definite treat.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Sewell

customer_reviews.title: Healthy and Tasty!
customer_reviews.text: These bars are like a full meal. They are Very Tasty! Most of their sugar is in the form of "sugar alcohol", which is also known as "artificial sweetener." But he uses good quality ingredients and the sweetners he uses have a low glycemic index. Google his ingredients. You can decide for yourself. I feel good eating them, and my husband likes them, too!
customer_reviews.author: M. Bienert

customer_reviews.title: The category is:  PB&J Realness
customer_reviews.text: 10’s across the board! Great flavor. Fresh. A little high on the calorie side, but the protein count makes up for it. The bar is filling and I usually work this into my macros as an afternoon snack.
customer_reviews.author: MarHar

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product! I stay full throughout the day and it provides me with the protein I need. Other bars are about 20 g of protein. The only downside would be that you only get 12 bars. You can go to Walmart and get one bar for less than $2; so 12 would run you about $24/$25. Grant it, you don't get the variety at Walmart, but you still get them cheaper if you only like certain flavors.
customer_reviews.author: cabeck

customer_reviews.title: Tastiest Bar I Have Had
customer_reviews.text: Wow! What a bar these are! The taste will blow you away 100%! The nutrition is a bit off for these bars as they are 200 calories, and a whopping 4g of saturated fat(20% daily intake). Other than that complaint, I will buy these again and will continue to use them. In doing so, i will just watch all the other saturated fats i take in.
customer_reviews.author: Peter David Fried

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite protein bars. They only have a slight protein taste and the size is perfect for a meal replacement. They are pricey, but taste good.
customer_reviews.author: TMB

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these bars....
customer_reviews.text: I've always eaten healthy with some "splurging".... these bars help cure cravings for snack and level off any "drop-off" in-between meals....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting bar
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable taste. Almost too good to be true. I do believe the sugar content is low as with the carbohydrate levels as I do not get headaches after eating these.
customer_reviews.author: Plum Crazy

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely delicious!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several different protein bars trying to find the best one for my taste. Wow! Robert Irvine has the market cornered with these Fit Crunch Bars! I have purchased all of the flavors available and they are absolutely delicious! They taste like I am cheating but I'm not! I do have to say, this particular flavor is far too sweet (hence 4 out of 5 stars) but all the other flavors are certainly 5 star worthy. I cut the big bars in half and keep them in the freezer to take out as needed. This seller, "AMAZIN' is wonderful! Very fast service and packaged well! Thank you for carrying these bars...you are Amazin' :D
customer_reviews.author: Onesavvygal

customer_reviews.title: CHOCOLATE MELT Protein Bar
customer_reviews.text: The FITCRUNCH Protein Bar is a product that I have used on a regular basis. I was happy to see that I could purchase it from my favorite "go to" vendor. I was extremely disappointed to find that the chocolate was melted. Even refrigeration was not a solution. The chocolate still adheres to the inside of the wrapper. Since I eat one bar per day I try to ignore the chocolate mess. I hope you can solve the problem and make any other redress you deem appropriate. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Skip Walters

customer_reviews.title: Delicious! ...but melted
customer_reviews.text: These protein bars really are quite tasty! It's really a combination of a protein bar and a king sized candy bar, meaning that you get 30g of protein with your Snickers. Ordering these in the summer will result in an ugly melted bar, but still tasty!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: If you need a treat you won't feel bad about, this is it
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite-tasting protein bars out there. A bit on the high calorie side compared to some of the 200 cal ones, but it makes up for it with taste. If you need a treat you won't feel bad about, this is it. However, don't eat two in day. I have found the sugar alcohols can cause some uncomfortable gastrointestinal issues (i.e. using the bathroom more than normal). If you only eat one though, it's not a problem.
customer_reviews.author: A. Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Condition upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: The bars were delivered on Sunday ahead of time which was great. But when opened, the chocolate on the bars were melted. When opening the bars, the chocolate crumbles everywhere. Can't eat in vehicle due to the potential mess which is a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delicious, filling, and 30g of Protein
customer_reviews.text: Each flavor is delicious. Other bars either skimp on protein, are as filling as a glass of water, or simply don't taste all that good. These bars suffer none of those drawbacks. My local market no longer carries them but fortunately Amazon does. Highly recommend for those who train and lead on-the-go lifestyles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These have a great taste and consistency packed full of protein. I am picky about protein bars these are like cheating. I was hesitant but bought the variety pack and I liked all 4 even the peanut butter and jelly !!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Best Tasting Protein Bar on Market
customer_reviews.text: The FitCrunch Bar (all flavors) are by far the best protein bar on the market. Depending upon the size you buy, it can be a meal replacement bar or a snack bar. Unlike all the others on the market, this is the closest thing to a candy bar without all the inherent "bad" of a candy bar. They are certainly worth a try if you but protein bars.
customer_reviews.author: JBF

customer_reviews.title: These taste great!!!
customer_reviews.text: The Caramel/Peanut food bars are delicious, and they are big enough to count as either a full meal or two good sized snacks. I'll buy these from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Roger K. Atkinson

customer_reviews.title: The variety pack flavors taste bad in comparison to amazing flavor the caramel peanut and ...
customer_reviews.text: The variety pack flavors taste bad in comparison to amazing flavor the caramel peanut and chocolate peanut butter have. If you are considering these then the latter two flavors are the only ones I would suggest.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE consider adding the cinnamon bar as an optional variety pack over peanut butter and jelly. Other than that 2 thumbs up and a LOVE LOVE LOVE for this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Bar
customer_reviews.text: I have had many different types of protein bars and this is by far the best one I’ve ever had. I would buy this one over and over. It taste amazing to me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: really good
customer_reviews.text: it's amazing how much difference having a chef is in making energy bars. this tastes like a "twix" crossed with a "100,000" bar. and yes the chocolate will melt if you leave these in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: M. Webb

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: Used as a meal replacement while dieting, very tasty and remarkably healthy. I highly recommend these to anyone looking for a high protein low carb meal alternative. Price is a little steep but you do get great quality for the money!
customer_reviews.author: David Clemons

customer_reviews.title: Not the item I ordered
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy the variety pack of this product, but the shipment that arrived today was not the variety pack I ordered. It was only the chocolate chip cookie dough bars. Still good, just unhappy I didn’t get what I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OK taste but messy
customer_reviews.text: Definitely doesn't look like photo. Taste is adequate, BUT they are incredibly messy. Very crumbly, it gets everywhere. If it wasn't for the mess it makes i'd buy again.
customer_reviews.author: ianpett

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting and fresher than in the store
customer_reviews.text: Love the bars. I was surprised at the difference in ordering direct rather than from my local store. These were significantly softer and fresher than store bought. Still good in the store, but direct was surprisingly even better.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Love these bars
customer_reviews.text: We really like the Irvine products and this is one of the few places you can get them by the box
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth B.

customer_reviews.title: Good taste, strong nutrition profile
customer_reviews.text: These bars are really a wonderful thing. They give me an option for a meal replacement when I'm travelling or on the go, without spiking my carb intake for the day. Some may find the amount of artificial sweetener to be too high, but as a diabetic I don't have much of a choice in the matter - so it doesn't bother me one bit.
customer_reviews.author: William M. Cunning

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting Protein Bars on the market
customer_reviews.text: These bars are the best tasting I have ever had- and I have been choking down bad Protein power, bars and liquid since 1985! Great protein to carb ratio
customer_reviews.author: C. Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Best bar available
customer_reviews.text: Best protein bar I've found so far. All four of these flavors have been good, I'm excited to try the others.
customer_reviews.author: Scott R DeHart

customer_reviews.title: Processed junk and made me feel like crap. Just get some fruit and nuts instead
customer_reviews.text: Processed junk and made me feel like crap. Just get some fruit and nuts instead. Your body will thank you later
customer_reviews.author: AndrewR

customer_reviews.title: Deliciously yummy!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been eating FitCrunch bars for a couple of years now and like all of the flavors, but this one is off the chain delicious! It tastes like a crunchy version of a peanut butter and jelly sandwich, but it packs in the protein without adding too many carbs or sugars. I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: D. Bordelon

customer_reviews.title: These Had Melted And Dried Out At Some Point In Time
customer_reviews.text: The protein bars had melted at some point in time before I received them. Either during storage or while being shipped. So they had an old dried out chocolate look to them. It affected the taste of them as well. I went ahead and ate them but I will not order anymore of these because I'm guessing I'll get the same outcome.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery L Lovins

customer_reviews.title: Love fitcrunch
customer_reviews.text: Best tasting protein bars. No bad aftertaste and my belly doesn’t get upset from them. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying that i’ve never written a review for any product but this one is worth it. ITS AMAZING. i’ve been looking for a protein bar for a while now trying a bunch of different ones just to be disappointed over and over again until I found Fit Crunch. I am definitely going to be ordering again. the taste is amazing, you can’t even tell there is protein in it! just WOW.
customer_reviews.author: Camille Magnan

customer_reviews.title: Taste was everything
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact they arent chewy like the other protein bars I have bought.. they really are like eating a candy bar.... the peanut butter one was better .... the chocolate chip one was good and these were pretty good as well .. They are a little more in prices here but you do get delivery where as you have to drive for me at least 30 minutes to get them... I am gonna buy more
customer_reviews.author: johnnie walton

customer_reviews.title: Tasty protien bars
customer_reviews.text: I really like these but mainly bought them as a dessert that is somewhat guilt free plus protien haha
customer_reviews.author: kenzie

customer_reviews.title: Description is misleading
customer_reviews.text: Flavors are not as described. I like the product, but disappointed with “assorted flavors” or whoever did the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: FZ

customer_reviews.title: Delicious, no really-these are GOOD
customer_reviews.text: These PB&J bars are the best! I have tried quite a few and these are by far my favorite - but they are huge. Not too much jelly, So I didn’t find them too sweet. Good amount of soft PB.
customer_reviews.author: Jonnine Eras

customer_reviews.title: Tasty and a great meal supplement!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! They're like 450-ish calories with the right amount of sugar, carbs, fat (the right kind), not too many sugar alcohols (which have that nasty side effect) and can help you last hours without needing to eat again. I definitely recommend these for breakfast and lunch (with a good workout for lunch) if you're looking to shed some weight.
customer_reviews.author: Drew King

customer_reviews.title: Peanut butter one
customer_reviews.text: The peanut butter one is the only one that taste good the rest of them are not very good in flavor
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Snicker's Bar!!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many of the protein bars on the market. My trainer recommended these and they taste like a Snicker's Bar! It is a great way for me to get my protein and candy fix all in one! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: These are so sweet you can't eat them. If you want to try - I have 11 left.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Conrad

customer_reviews.title: Great product, bad shipping!
customer_reviews.text: The shipping is awful, but I love the bars. The last shipment I got was melted, the box was ripped open and half the bars were missing! Please package them better!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these bars! The top of the line! Not a hint of chemical or unnatural smell or taste. So good and its healthy! The biggest problem I have with these bars is that I have to show a lot of self control to eat only one! Would buy again and again!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

product_meta.title: FITCRUNCH Protein Bars, Designed by Robert Irvine, Protein Bar, Gluten Free, Award Winning Taste, Whey Protein Isolate, Low Sugar (12 Bars, Peanut Butter & Jelly)
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:Peanut Butter and JellyThe award-winning FITCRUNCH Baked Bar is arguably the best protein bar ever made. Created by co-founder and celebrity chef, Robert Irvine, to provide quality nutrition and an unmatched taste that you’d expect from a world-renown chef. FITCRUNCH makes getting your protein more enjoyable than ever before. Sold world-wide, enjoyed by athletes, fitness enthusiasts and families.
feature_bullets: Peanut Butter and Jelly: The makers of the award-winning FITCRUNCH Peanut Butter Baked Bar are bringing a famous throwback to life with the all-new Peanut Butter and Jelly bar. This classic combination of peanut butter and jelly stops cravings in their tracks, while delivering high-quality whey protein isolate with just 6g of sugar. Some call it a “living legend.”

Whey Protein: Our protein bars are made from a unique Protein Blend (Whey Protein Isolate, Whey Protein Concentrate). We believe this is the best quality protein available on the market, which is why we have it in all our products!

6 Layer Baked Bar: We have the worlds first 6 layer baked bar! Most protein bars have just one layer, ours stands out with 6 layers that all play an important part in our award winning protein bar appearance and taste!
Why Us: Aside from having a 6-Layer protein bar, our bars are filled with 30g of protein and just 6G of sugar!

About Us: The award-winning FITCRUNCH Baked Bar is arguably the best protein bar ever made. Created by co-founder and celebrity chef, Robert Irvine, to provide quality nutrition and an unmatched taste that you’d expect from a world-renown chef. FITCRUNCH makes getting your protein more enjoyable than ever before. Sold world-wide, enjoyed by athletes, fitness enthusiasts and families.
